title: Update School Detail banner to match single-row photo strip (no collage) like provided reference

requirements.text: Update the School Detail page banner UI (component: `frontend/src/components/school/SchoolProfileBanner.tsx`) to avoid the current collage-style 2x2 image grid and instead render a single-row, 4-tile photo strip that visually matches the uploaded reference (`image-7.png`).

quotes: very good need some improvement like dont show like image  collage  you should show like this

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop/wide layouts, the banner shows 4 images in a single horizontal row (not a 2x2 grid).
Images use `object-cover` and do not appear stretched; each tile maintains a consistent aspect ratio.
If only 1 image is available, the banner renders a single full-width image tile gracefully (no empty tiles).
The existing dark gradient readability overlay, school name, and location remain present and readable over the images.
All user-facing and accessibility text introduced/changed remains in English.

requirements.text: Adjust the School Detail banner pagination/controls in `frontend/src/components/school/SchoolProfileBanner.tsx` to match the reference interaction pattern: keep left/right navigation arrows for multi-page photo sets, and replace the current centered remaining-count overlay with a compact “See photos {count}” style control on the last visible tile when additional photos exist.

quotes: dont show like image  collage  you should show like this

acceptanceCriteria: When more than 4 banner images exist, left/right navigation arrows are available and usable (mouse + keyboard) with English `aria-label`s (e.g., “Previous photos”, “Next photos”).
When more than 4 images exist, the 4th tile displays a compact overlay control that communicates the remaining count in the format “See photos {remainingCount}” (English).
The “See photos {remainingCount}” overlay does not block the school name/location overlay readability (no overlapping that makes the title/location hard to read).
The banner layout remains stable (no layout shift) when navigating pages.
No changes are made to Directory listing SchoolCards; this change applies only to the School Detail banner.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (immutable UI component sources).
Keep all user-facing text and accessibility labels in English.
Do not introduce new backend methods or data requirements for this change.
nonGoals: Do not change the Directory page hero/banner behavior.
Do not reintroduce any collage/multi-tile behavior into `frontend/src/components/directory/SchoolCard.tsx` (directory cards).
Do not route images through the backend; continue using existing curated/static image URLs already provided by current logic.
